verse.name: e1a
verse.lines:
Every word of worship with one accord
Every praise Every praise is to our God

verse.name: e1b
verse.lines:
Sing Hallelujah to Our God
Glory Hallelujah is due our God
Every Praise Every Praise is to our God

verse.name: e1c
verse.lines:
God my Saviour
God my Healer
God my deliverer
Yes He is, Yes He is
